name: Snowbrawl (SoothillAudioMedia)
description:
Game Design                      - Luke Stamper (www.lukestampergames.com)                  (https://lukestamper.itch.io/)

Game Audio/Music        - Soothill Audio Media 

Software                               - Unity and Wwise

Snowbrawl is a third person snowball fight game based on Snowfight by robotduck.

Knock down all the snowmen on each level to complete it. Avoid being hit by enemy snowballs and fire back to stun them.

There are 12 levels to complete, and awards to chase for an extra challenge.

Played with keyboard and mouse. Controls visible in game.
